etymology.interpretation: Literally “Zhan River City,” it names the prefecture-level coastal city in southwestern Guangdong, China. In casual speech 市 may be dropped, leaving just 湛江.

examples.chinese: 湛江市位于广东省西南部(湛江市位於廣東省西南部)。
examples.pinyin: Zhànjiāng Shì wèiyú Guǎngdōng Shěng xīnán bù.
examples.english: Zhanjiang City is located in the southwestern part of Guangdong Province.

examples.chinese: 我打算去湛江市旅游(我打算去湛江市旅遊)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ dǎsuàn qù Zhànjiāng Shì lǚyóu.
examples.english: I plan to travel to Zhanjiang City.

examples.chinese: 湛江市的海鲜很有名(湛江市的海鮮很有名)。
examples.pinyin: Zhànjiāng Shì de hǎixiān hěn yǒumíng.
examples.english: The seafood of Zhanjiang City is very famous.
